Shockwave/Unitron:



Shockwave pulled hard left, the missile flying by as Shockwave added power to 
his afterburners to bring himself about.

---

"So, you want to shoot missiles, eh?" Unitron asked himself.  He got a target 
lock, armed the missiles, and fired two missiles down at Depp.
